kpi.name: M8001C250

kpi_info.title: Number of transmissions with bundle size 4 NACK on PDSCH using MCS30
kpi_info.use: The number of negative acknowledged transmissions with bundle size 4 using MCS30 on PDSCH. Only TBs with bundle NACK should be counted. UPDATED: The counter is updated in each TTI scheduling period when bundle NACK received on PDSCH using bundle size 4 from MCS30.

kpi.kpi_alias: Number of transmissions with bundle size 4 NACK on PDSCH using MCS30
